Description.Text: Karana Palms Resort is conveniently located in the popular Surfers Paradise area. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. All the necessary facilities, including photocopying, printer, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, are at hand. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer internet access â€“ wireless, non smoking rooms, air conditioning, wake-up service, desk to ensure a restful night. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, massage, garden. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Karana Palms Resort.
